item.title: Ali
item.info: A biography of sports legend, Muhammad Ali, from his early days to his days in the ring.

item.title: Creed
item.info: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

item.title: Grudge Match
item.info: A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout -- 30 years after their last match.

item.title: Mr. Calzaghe
item.info: The story of the rise to glory of boxer Joe Calzaghe.

item.title: Raging Bull
item.info: An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring, destroys his life outside it.

item.title: Rocky
item.info: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a supremely rare chance to fight the heavy-weight champion, Apollo Creed, in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

item.title: Rocky II
item.info: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

item.title: Rocky III
item.info: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

item.title: Rocky IV
item.info: After iron man Drago, a highly intimidating 6-foot-5, 261-pound Soviet athlete, kills Apollo Creed in an exhibition match, Rocky comes to the heart of Russia for 15 pile-driving boxing rounds of revenge.

item.title: Rocky V
item.info: Reluctantly retired from boxing and back from riches to rags, Rocky takes on a new protege who betrays him; As the champ's son must adjust to his family's new life after bankruptcy.

item.title: Rocky Balboa
item.info: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight; against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

item.title: Southpaw
item.info: Boxer Billy Hope turns to trainer Tick Wills to help him get his life back on track after losing his wife in a tragic accident and his daughter to child protection services.

item.title: The Fighter
item.info: A look at the early years of boxer "Irish" Micky Ward and his brother who helped train him before going pro in the mid 1980s.

item.title: Tyson
item.info: A mixture of original interviews and archival footage and photographs sheds light on the life experiences of Mike Tyson.
